org.trianacode.gui.action

Interface ToolSelectionHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationFrame, ComponentSelectionHandler, LeafListener, MainTriana, MapPanel

    public interface ToolSelectionHandler
    An interface implemented by classes that can return a selected tool

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToolSelectionListener(ToolSelectionListener listener)
      Adds a listener to be notified when the tool selection changes
      TaskGraph getSelectedTaskgraph() 
      Tool getSelectedTool() 
      Tool[] getSelectedTools() 
      TrianaClient getSelectedTrianaClient() 
      boolean isSingleSelectedTool() 
      void removeToolSelectionListener(ToolSelectionListener listener)
      Removes a listener from being notified when the tool selection changes

    • Method Detail

      • addToolSelectionListener

        void addToolSelectionListener(ToolSelectionListener listener)
        Adds a listener to be notified when the tool selection changes

      • removeToolSelectionListener

        void removeToolSelectionListener(ToolSelectionListener listener)
        Removes a listener from being notified when the tool selection changes

      • isSingleSelectedTool

        boolean isSingleSelectedTool()
        Returns:
        true if only a single tool is selected

      • getSelectedTool

        Tool getSelectedTool()
        Returns:
        the currently selected tool (null if none selected)

      • getSelectedTools

        Tool[] getSelectedTools()
        Returns:
        an array of the currently selected tools

      • getSelectedTaskgraph

        TaskGraph getSelectedTaskgraph()
        Returns:
        the currently selected taskgraph (usually parent of selected tool)

      • getSelectedTrianaClient

        TrianaClient getSelectedTrianaClient()
        Returns:
        the triana client responsible for the selected tools (null if none)
